special_text:
You may have Vice enter as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield, except they’re an artifact planeswalker instead of their other types and has all of their abilities.
[+1]: Untap up to two target artifacts you control.
[-2]: Create a Powerstone token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”)[/i] [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.”)[/i]
